name: Whetstone
description: A small stone used to keep bladed weapons sharp.

name: Healing Potion Flask
description: A small glass flask with a red liquid that restores 10 health points.

name: 10-meter Rope
description: A sturdy hemp rope useful for climbing or tying things.

name: Torch
description: A wooden stick with one end wrapped in cloth, ready to be lit.

name: Steel Dagger
description: A small dagger with a sharp blade, useful in combat or as a tool.

name: Travel Ration
description: A pack of dried food and nuts sufficient for one day.

name: Kingdom Map
description: An old parchment showing the geography of the region.

name: Holy Symbol
description: An amulet bearing the mark of a deity, used by clerics and paladins.
